title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד - 3 בדצמבר
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Java/ C++/ Python Professional, איש/אשת אוטומציה, Online Marketing, מפתח/ת J2EE, מעצב/ת UI ועוד
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Java/ C++/ Python Professional, איש/אשת אוטומציה, Online Marketing, מפתח/ת J2EE, מעצב/ת UI ועוד

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
חברת סטארטאפ, שהוקמה בשנת 2013, מפתחת מנוע חיפוש המציג אפשרויות לתחבורה ציבורית ברחבי אירופה. המוצר זמין ב-WEB ובאפליקציות Mobile. כיום החברה מונה 125 עובדים, ב-30 מדינות שונות. בסוף 2014 גייסה החברה 27 מיליון דולר.
דרישות:
נכונות לרילוקיישן לברלין.
אנגלית ברמה גבוהה.
ניסיון באחת מהשפות הבאות: Java, Ruby ,JavaScript, C# , python.
ניסיון בבדיקות אוטומטיות באחד מהכלים : Cucumber, Selenium, Appium, Calabash, CasperJS.
ניסיון בבדיקות ידניות.
הבנה בסיסית ב-HTML , JS.
ניסיון ב-CI – יתרון.
ניסיון בבדיקות אוטומציה לMobile – יתרון.
לשליחת קורות חיים למשרת Software Developer in Testing

לחברת הייטק מעולה באזור המרכז דרושים מפתחי JAVA תותחים בסביבת WEB.
דרישות:
3-4 שנות ניסיון בפיתוח J2EE- חובה.
ניסיון בעבודה עם spring.
ניסיון עם BIG DATA- יתרון משמעותי.
תואר מאוניברסיטה נחשבת- יתרון משמעותי.
לשליחת קורות חיים למפתח/ת J2EE
Managing online and offline campaigns in variety of platforms. The marketing Campaigns
Manager is responsible for analyzing data and optimizing campaigns performance by investigating the markets preferences, think of attractive creatives and analyzing the campaigns data in order to decide what to do next. Working with leading companies: Google, Facebook, Bing, Twitter etc.
Requirements:
B.Sc. in Engineering/BA Statistics or similar- Grade average 80 and up.
Analytical abilities.
High level of English.
Excel skills.
Additional languages – advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Online Marketing

Are you a passionate UI Designer?
Have you ever dreamt to work in one of the world’s leading gaming companies?
To leave your mark? To make a difference?
Playtika is the place for you.
Together we will create the most epic kick-ass entertainment experience ever!
Create a playful, intuitive cohesive look & feel, and overall user experience for our products.
Responsible for designing and implementing challenging and dynamic interfaces for web and mobile environments.
Conceptualize, present and execute ideas within a tight schedule technical.
Requirements:
At least 2 years of experience in UI design.
Deep understanding of UX principals.
Excellent knowledge of Photoshop and Flash and After Effects.
Knowledge in 3D Max/Maya/illustrator – advantage.
Experience developing for multi-platform user interface – advantage.
Gaming background – advantage.
PLEASE ATTACH PORTFOLIO (sorry, but we will contact only resumes with portfolio links).
To send a CV for the position of UI Designer
We are seeking for an QA lead.
Requirements:
3-5 years’ experience in software manual testing (Functional ,UI ,regression and versions release).
Minimum 2 years’ experience as a technical QA leader.
Proven experience on web based application testing (client –server).
Proven experience on read and write tests documents (STD, STP, STR).
Experience working with Test management tools (visual studio/MTM/QC).
Autodidact, independent, problem solver with get things done attitude.
Advantage:
Experience with automation testing tools for web (selenium-webDriver) – a major plus.
Experience with O.O languages (c#, Java).
Experience with scripting language (JavaScript).
Experience with packet analysers tools (Wireshark, fiddler).
Working with AgileScrum methodologies.
To send a CV for the position of QA Lead
As our Senior Technical Architect, you will design and lead projects, solutions and product development at the forefront of the company. You will assist the product team with defining the company solutions and will join the sales and the delivery teams when technical effort is needed. You will develop code for strategic prototypes.
As part of the CTO office team, you will be part of technical initiatives and the company vision.
Requirements:
10+ years of experience in large system development.
10+ years of hands-on experience developing code for prototypes.
Excellent knowledge in networking.
Excellent knowledge and experience in system design & Open Daylight.
5+ years of OO and Java experience.
To send a CV for the position of Senior architect

A leading International Online Corporate is seeking for Java/ C++/ Python Professional for relocation toTokyo-Japan.
To join a well-known corporate and to lead cutting edge technologies and architecture for Big data based products.
Great opportunity for relocation to Japan! To work in a fast paced company and state of the art technologies.
Requirements:
Computer science degree from a leading academic institute.
Solid hands-on experience in web application in Java,C++ or Python.
Solid experience in Big Data – A must.
Experience in wide range of data stores – My SQL/Mongo DB/Redis.
Experience in machine learning and B2C companies – Big advantage.
Best practice person and developer.
English – Business level .
Willing to relocate to Tokyo.
To send a CV for the position of Java/ C++/ Python Professional

Have you ever wanted to take part in building a big data search and analytics engine?Have you ever dreamed that you will have an opportunity to re-invent the way people explore big data? ‘Reinventing Big-Data Engine’ is happening NOW in Kusto team.
The team started as a small incubation a year ago, and has already made a lot of buzz inside Microsoft, offering new solution for exploring and analyzing logs data which is based on new disruptive technology. Kusto’s lists of customers already includes large Microsoft cloud services, and is constantly expanding.
Now, that the team is growing, we are looking for strong and motivated developers to position Kusto as THE technology for log search and text analytics across Microsoft, providing value to external customers offering and Microsoft internal large scale telemetry initiatives. Join us and be part of the Next Big Data Thing.
Requirements:
You are passionate about writing performant code (C# and C++).
You are even more passionate about building a large scale service.
You are really interested to understand how things work deep down.
You see the mission and you know how to drive to it on your own.
You love customers and wish you had a link to them directly.
You have a desire to deal with a real engineering challenge and win.
To send a CV for the position of Software Engineer- Kusto

Ninja iOS developer wanted for a startup that will change the world!
Located in the heart of Tel Aviv, in Rothschild Avenue, with espresso, sushi at noon & hipsters on the street. BEEN THERE DONE THAT. PapTap is not just any startup.
Elite technology squad with the cause of making small businesses lives happier.
Offices are fun & cool in Or Yehuda with parking for all, unaware hipsters & without the traffic. So instead of waking every morning into the daily Tel Aviv chase, wake up with a smile & come home – to us.
Requirements:
BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject.
At least 2-3 year of experience with native (Objective C) iOS applications development on Xcode platform.
At least 3 published running apps in portfolio.
Deep understanding of the full mobile development life cycle, actual experience with OOP in Objective C, Memory Management, iPhone/iPad Utilization, Social Integration, Client-Server, SQLite, Delegation, Storyboards, Core Animations, Core Data, FMDataBase, UIDynamics, OpenGL.
Collaboration abilities with cross-functional teams to define, plan, execute and ship new features.
To send a CV for the position of Lead iOS Developer

Forter is looking for a Fullstack (Product) Engineer to develop and cultivate new products for fraud detection. More than in other teams, the engineering decision made in Forter’s product team needs to balance not only engineering factors, but also user experience, aesthetics, legal and financial considerations, and a general sense for what’s most important.
Engineers on the product team have a knack for making tools powerful without compromising their ease of use. This applies to both for visual tools (like our customers’ dashboard and internal analysts’ system) and programming tools (like our API).
Stuff you’ll be doing:
Influence how our product offering looks and behaves.
Contribute to our browsers’ interfaces and research toward fraud prevention.
Design and implement unique solutions for data interfaces both to merchants’ platforms and internal tools (for our analysts team).
Take full ownership of a feature set from first discussion to bringing it live on the site.
Requirements:
Experience of 3+ years throughout the web development stack such as Node.js, AngularJS, React.js etc.
Expert-level knowledge of javascript: you understand prototypical inheritance, scope & closures.
Advanced HTML & CSS (including SASS/LESS) skills.
Strong pixel-by-pixel attention to detail.
Great communication skills.
Self-driven and can deliver solutions partnering with both internal and external development teams without the need of a project manager.
To send a CV for the position of Fullstack (Product) Engineer
keywords: ui,ux,vsli engineer,web,web designers,גיקג\'וב,דרושים,מהנדסים,מנהלים,מעצבים,משרות,משרות בהיי-טק,מתכנתים,ראשי צוות,רשת,גיקגו\'ב,לוח משרות הייטק
